ftxt.onOpenClose.description: check when a certain sensor closes or opens

ftxt.onCounter.description: check when a certain counter changes its value

ftxt.onInput.description: check when a certain input changes its value

ftxt.getCounter.description: get the value of a counter

ftxt.getSensor.description: get the value of a sensor

ftxt.isClosed.description: check whether a sensor is closed

ftxt.doSetLamp.description: Set the value of the given lamp

ftxt.doSetOutput.description: Set the value of the given output

ftxt.doResetCounter.description: Reset the value of the given counter

ftxt.doConfigureInput.description: Set the mode of the given input.

ftxt.doSetMotorSpeed.description: Set the speed of the given motor

ftxt.doSetMotorSpeedDir.description: Set speed and direction of the given motor

ftxt.doSetMotorSpeedDirDist.description: Move the motor by the given values.

ftxt.doSetMotorSpeedDirSync.description: Move the motor by the given values.

ftxt.doSetMotorSpeedDirDistSync.message: Move motor [MOTOR_ID] and motor [MOTOR_ID2] by [STEPS] steps with [SPEED] [DIRECTION]
ftxt.doSetMotorSpeedDirDistSync.description: Move the motor by the given values.

ftxt.doStopMotorAndReset.description: Stop the motor and reset all synchronizations.
